CustomerDueDate.title: CustomerDueDate
CustomerDueDate.description: This is the due date or latest that the customer wants for their booking window

EarliestStart.title: EarliestStart
EarliestStart.description: This is the earliest permitted date/time that the appointment can be for. Default is Now().

Messaging_Session_Id.title: Messaging_Session_Id
Messaging_Session_Id.description: Retrieve this from context variables. This is known as: Messaging Session Id, MessagingSessionId, or RoutableId

assetID.title: assetID
assetID.description: This is any asset Id that is previously retrieved/mentioned

contactID.title: contactID
contactID.description: This is the contact ID of the user that was authenticated

workTypeId.title: workTypeId
workTypeId.description: This is the Id of the Work Type that was selected
